article_id,
user_id,

mapper.update:
update articles
user_id = #{user_id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
written_time = #{written_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
read_times = #{read_times,jdbcType=INTEGER},
title = #{title,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
article = #{article,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where article_id = #{article_id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update articles set user_id = #{user_id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, written_time = #{written_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, read_times = #{read_times,jdbcType=INTEGER}, title = #{title,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, article = #{article,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where article_id = #{article_id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
